nodes.text: HoloNet News — A Galaxy Divided (Part 2) is a continuation of the in-universe HoloNet News podcast tying into the 2008 Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. The installment leads into the October 2, 2009 release of the Republic Heroes video game. It was written by Brooks Brown, produced by Brown and David W. Collins, and featured a voice cast of Collins and Jesse Harlin.
